rules_text:
Whenever this creature attacks and isn't blocked, return up to one card that incited it this turn to its owner's hand.
Incite {1{U}B}{UB} [i]({1{U}B}{UB}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature as a sorcery. It gains this card's abilities until end of turn.)[/i]
